items.title: One Fall Super Tough Skull Tee
items.description: Get the latest tee designed by 8-year-old artist Marty Kristek
fullDescription: New tee design by a prominent local artist and fan who happens to be 8 years old. Marty Kristek designed this tee for us (and we paid him for it as we would any artist.) It's a pretty tough design and since our pals are also super tough, these are selling out QUICK!
We have a handful of kids/youth sizes -- the artist is modeling a Youth Medium.

items.title: One Fall Pigeon Logo Tee (Vintage Black)
items.description: New tee by Adam Cutler at Motionless Visions
fullDescription: New tee design by the incredible Adam Cutler at Motionless Visions.
This one is the VINTAGE BLACK, which you can buy here or in person at our shows.
The sizes are Fitted (sometimes called "Women's"), which are Bella + Canvas Relaxed Fit, and Straight Cut (sometimes called "Men's"), which are Comfort Colors Garment-Dyed Heavyweight tees.
In the images, Kyle is wearing a Straight Cut Medium and Helen is wearing a Fitted Medium (Helen is wearing the Dark Grey color option).

items.title: One Fall Logo Tee
items.description: Introducing the ONE FALL tee with art by Paul Lyons
fullDescription: Get yourself the first-ever ONE FALL tee shirt, featuring logo art by the very rad Paul Lyons. You can cut the sleeves off if you want! Give them pitties some air, you know?
In the images, Caleb is wearing a Straight Cut Large and Helen is wearing a Fitted Medium.
The sizes are Fitted (sometimes called "Women's") and Straight Cut (sometimes called "Men's").

items.title: One Fall Logo Snapback Hat
items.description: These hats? Super cool! People love them once they try them on
fullDescription: Hey, these are neat hats! Look, I don't know a ton about hats, but people who wear hats are like "Oh sick, cool hats!" So they are probably good. We see people wearing them a lot once they buy them.

items.title: One Fall Baby Onesie
items.description: Dunno, maybe you have a baby and the baby isn't that cool?
fullDescription: I dunno, maybe you have a baby and the baby isn't that cool? Make your baby more cool.
These allegedly fit babies 6 months - 1 year old!

items.title: One Fall logo patch
items.description: 4"Ã—3" embroidered patch featuring the iconic ONE FALL logo designed by Paul Lyons
fullDescription: 4"x3" embroidered patch featuring the iconic ONE FALL logo designed by Paul Lyons
